attributes.action: Make a change for BTEC 2016 qualifications for January 2022 exams.
attributes.additional_details: COVID has impacted our learning drastically where we had missed a lot of content in the past 2 years for our course and have been given one less chance to retake our examinations. A-level examinations are being given a reduced topic list however nothing much is being done for BTEC qualifications.
attributes.background: Please provide us with either a topic list or reduced content for BTEC (2016) qualification examinations as COVID has heavily impacted our learning for our course and not much is being done for BTEC qualifications as much as A-Level qualifications.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you'd like a topic list or reduced content for BTECs in 2022. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
